resources.string:
Prerequisites for Running the Software：
1. The device must have root access, and the software permissions should be granted.
2. Device support : V-AB；

Issues：
1. When selecting the ROM path, be sure to choose from “Local Storage.” Otherwise, you might not be able to select the ROM.
2. Due to Android’s restrictions on background services, try to keep this software as a foreground app during updates (you can move it to the background once the update progress appears in the notification bar).
3. This software supports official ROM upgrades/downgrades. For custom ROMs and near-stock ROMs, users should test them independently.
4. If you receive an update failure prompt, restart your phone and wait for some time before attempting the flashing operation.
5. Feel free to add any other questions or concerns you may have.Here~
